text: Failure is what we're all running from, we're always running toward success with failure at our back.
author: Natalie Goldberg

text: We can't have a failure in Iraq, but we also can't be there for the next 10 years because if we are, it's going to become, I think, a failure in and of itself.
author: Dennis Ross

text: If you're not a born-again Christian, you're a failure as a human being.
author: Jerry Falwell

text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: I think everyone shares a fear of failure - that you're only as good as your most recent collection. That's definitely a fear, but it's a fear that fuels me, that makes me want to work harder, that makes me take on more challenges.
author: Alexander Wang

text: Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it.
author: Chuck Noll

text: So it is in poetry. All we ask is that the mood recorded shall impress us as having been of the kind that exhausts the imaginative capacity if it fails to do this the failure will announce itself either in prose or in insignificant verse.
author: John Drinkwater

text: None of us is guaranteed against failure or corruption of any kind witness what's going on in the world in this moment, the follies of human nature and the failures of human nature.
author: Morris West

text: Nothing succeeds, they say, like success. And certainly nothing fails like failure.
author: Margaret Drabble

text: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan.
author: Alan Price

text: The only failure is not to try.
author: George Clooney
